name: Dream Paradox
description:
Dream Paradox is an old style FPS game, kill all the enemies and restart the game.

Credits: Game music by Anonymalex (Rights Purchased); Menu music by Prime Beatz (Copyright Free); Monster sprites by Miziziziz (YouTube); Level design, game idea and code by Pabeio (Creator).

Controllers: WASD to move; R to restart;  Left Button to shoot; Esc to pause.

Features: The whole game; Full controller support; Something to do when bored.

That's all, enjoy!
